Interface QuestionRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Question,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Question,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Question,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Question>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Question,​java.lang.Long>
@Repository
public interface QuestionRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Question,​java.lang.Long>
